results.description:
Dear Customer,

Due to Corona-Virus situation:

If you will have any questions, please contact us!

Thank you for your understanding!
_____________________________________________________________

Peace Joy Love Shirt,  Vegan Shirt Funny, Sleep Shirt, Gift For Her, Self Care, Positive Shirts,  Essential Tshirt, Live Love Laugh, Friends Shirt, Holiday Pajamas, Flower Power,  I Love You To The Moon And Back, Chicken Shirt

#PeaceJoyLoveShirt, # VeganShirtFunny, #SleepShirt, #GiftForHer, #SelfCare, #PositiveShirts, # EssentialTshirt, #LiveLoveLaugh, #FriendsShirt, #HolidayPajamas, #FlowerPower, # ILoveYouToTheMoonAndBack, #ChickenShirt


This super soft 100% cotton T-shirt with a unique custom design is your PERFECT shirt for YOU. We proudly use high-quality materials and only high-quality print. Wear it with jeans or your trendy shorts. You really will LOVE it, and never want to take it off! ♥♥♥

♥---DESIGN ---♥
This UNISEX Bella & Canvas T-shirt is made with premium quality knit cotton jersey for both men and women. Superior Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, unisex sizing, shoulder taping, and short sleeves features. A modern unisex fitted shirt, this style features a crew neck and contoured side seams for a stylish trendy t-shirt. Fabrication: 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz.

♥---SIZING ---♥
Unisex shirt with variety of colors and sizes.
The sizes are looser and longer than a typical woman tees. So we recommend to order one size down for women for fitted look. (Please make sure to measure yourself well before give the order. Thank you.)

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Chest / Full Body Length Chart:
-> X-SMALL: 17" Chest x 28" Length
-> SMALL: 18" Chest x 28" Length
-> MEDIUM: 20" Chest x 29" Length
-> LARGE: 22" Chest x 30" Length
-> X-LARGE: 24" Chest x 31" Length
-> 2X-LARGE: 26" Chest x 32" Length
-> 3X-LARGE: 28" Chest x 33" Length

* Disclaimer: Please note that the above sizing chart is subject to change.

♥---CARE - INSTRUCTION ---♥ 
Follow these care instructions to enjoy long-term your T-shirt and its custom design.
Machine wash cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach, only when necessary. No fabric softeners. Tumble dry low or hang-dry for longest life. Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration. Do not dry clean.


♥---HOW TO ORDER---♥
  1. Choose your RIGHT SIZE from the drop-down menu.
  2. Choose the QUANTITY of your order from the drop-down menu.
  3. Hit the button "ADD TO CART".
  4. Let us know all info for your order in the "Notes to seller" section by checkout.
  5. That's it!
  6. We will let you know about your order and shipping details.


♥---SHIPPING INFO---♥
Please make sure your address on file with Etsy is up to date. The BesteeShop will not be responsible for any outdated or incorrect shipping information provided. Your order will be fine for shipping in 6-10 business days in the US. Please allow 5-8 additional business days for delivery from the USPS/DHL when shipping within the United States. Shipping time to Canada 10-15  business days, international shipping (out of the US and Canada) takes 15-30 business days.


♥--- I M P O R T A N T - I N F O ---♥

** Every tee is made to order. It takes a few days before being able to ship. 
** Colors may vary slightly from monitor to printed product. This can be due to different monitor settings used and the nature of handcrafted products.
** Please make sure your shipping address is correct PRIOR to check out as this can not be changed afterward. BesteeShop is NOT responsible for shipping addresses that are not correct.
** No refunds or exchanges due to ordering the wrong size. Please refer to the size chart. ** 
** Made in the U.S.A.

If you have any questions please feel to free contact us through the 'Contact shop owner' button. Do not hesitate to let us know everything you need prior to ordering.

Designs by ©BesteeShop. @ BESTEESHOP 2020   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Flour Sack Tea Towel, Inspirational Custom Kitchen Towel
results.description:
LIVE, LOVE, LAUGH Inspirational Old Fashioned Flour Sack Tea Towel 

★Design is heat transfer vinyl. White towels have black and red htv, dark towels have white and red. Other vinyl colors available. 

★New Towel Colors!! Now available in Black, Red, Grey and Navy!

★ Made of 100% cotton that's woven in the traditional diagonal pattern - This guarantees a strong, durable material that's built to last and maintain its maximum absorbency. When kept properly, these flour sack towels can last years before needing replacement and can soak up messes as easily as paper towels. The towel is 27x27. Machine Washable, toss them in with your regular laundry. The durable fabric and 100% cotton helps to resist shrinking and produces no lint. It's easy to add these to your normal wash routines whether that's hand washing, or tumbling in with the rest of your clothes.  (Dry on Medium to Low heat to preserve the life of the vinyl design.)

results.title: Brown leathers wrap bracelet with personalised message, gift for him, Hand stamped to order
results.description:
Stamped to order, this bracelet is a lovely gift for any boho fan. Popular for festivals and every day wear, this beautiful personalised gift is sure to be appreciated by both women or men regardless of age.

This tag comes on 120cm of 3mm thick leather cord so that you can tie it as desired (I recommend a simple knot). 

Wording can be chosen to suit. I can use a larger tag if more words are required. 

Due to the nature of hand stamping on aluminium (which is a light weight material), there will often be differences in the depth of the hand stamped letters/ pictures, the letters/ pictures may have a slight difference in spacing and the letters may not always be straight.. However I will do my best to make it the best I can as I want you to use it! There will also be slight indentation on the back, which is normal even though all blanks are at least 1.5mm thick. 
Please check out the other listings in my store at lovebeauxdesigns.etsy.com.

results.title: Snowman Face Digital Feltie Embroidery Design File
results.description:
INSTANT DOWNLOAD DIGITAL FILE

PES, CSD, HUS, SHV, DST, EXP, PCS, HUS, VIP, JEF, SEW, XXX

Stitch Count- 1346
Width=1.18 " Height=1.69"

Embroidery design ONLY. This listing is for a digital design to be used on a embroidery machine. 

Once payment has cleared you will be able to download a zip file which will include:

~~~Single file in all formats
~~~Finished product picture
~~~PDF Instructions
~~~ 4x4 sorted files for supported extensions


You will be able to download your digital file through your Etsy account once payment has been cleared. If you have any problems with your download, please do not hesitate to contact EmbroiderThat.

To download your file, open the designated email and click the button "View your files on Etsy". You will be redirected to the download page where you can download the zipped file containing your purchased design(s). 

You can also download the designs from Etsy directly. 
My Account > Purchases > Click on the download button next to the purchased item.

Please note that you must have an embroidery machine in order to use these files. You must also have a way to transfer the files from your computer to your embroidery machine. 

When you purchase this listing you will receive a zip file with a digital design of the formats listed above. You ARE NOT purchasing a shirt, a patch or an outfit. Pictures may be included to show how the design is used.

Due to the digital nature of our products, NO refunds or exchanges will be given. You may use this design to make items for personal use or for small commercial jobs. You may NOT copy, share, sell or reproduce my digital designs in any format as your own.

All designs have been stitched out and tested.

If you re size, convert or edit my designs in any manor, we can not be responsible for the quality of design.

ALL sales are final. No refunds will be given due to the digital nature of the product.

results.title: Betty boop live love laugh glitter tumbler
results.description:
PLEASE READ -- IMPORTANT INFORMATION

We can not accept cancellations

All tumblers are double wall  stainless steel rated to keep cold 24hours hot 8+

 Any personalization or customisation needs to be added in the personalization field when ordering. If it is not added in here I cannot be responsible for it not being added to the Tumblr

All tumblers are handmade, so there could be some slight imperfections.

Free personalization! Add your name or monogram (first, last, middle)

Please provide monogram in the order that it should appear on your tumbler. I will use the exact order left in the note to me. 

Watercolor designs that can be found on some tumbler listings are only available for tumblers with white glitter on the top.

Any colors used for photography may differ in person due to lighting and your screen resolution.

When choosing a color the primary color will be the bottom color. We will choose the top depending on the decal. Some decals require the top to stay white. 

All tumblers are finished with FDA compliant epoxy and will have a smooth, glass like finish. You will NEVER have to worry about glitter coming off! Your decals will be permanent and NEVER peel! Keeps beverage hot/cold for hours. 

All tumblers include a reusable plastic straw.

 I cannot be held responsible for failure to read the details listed above. 

Due to the custom nature of these items, all returns, exchanges, or refunds will be approved only after the tumbler is sent back and inspected. In the event of an error on my part the tumbler will either be fixed or replaced. Buyer pays for return shipping.





Care instructions are provided with each tumbler.Due to the custom nature of these items we can not accept cancellations.

results.description:
Live Laugh Love ring - inspire her with this sterling silver ring, which is embellished with the words 'LIVE', 'LAUGH' AND 'LOVE'.

The words are spaced out so that you can turn the ring around to show your favourite word for the day.

The ring comes presented in a gift box, finished with a ribbon as shown with one of our birthstone rings in image 4.

***

Sizing:

This ring comes in two sizes:

UK: L / US: 5.75 ( a small/medium size)

UK: N / US: 6.75 (a medium/larger size)

The ring is approximately 2mm thick.



About us:

Honey Willow is named after my daughters Honey and Willow. I have been making jewellery celebrating loved ones and life's milestones for the past decade. Myself and my small team are based in a workshop in Bath and up to four skilled jewellery-makers work on every single piece of jewellery.

results.title: Live Love Land Rights - Indigenous Rights - Beginner Cross Stitch Pattern
results.description:
I could write a very long rant on this subject, but I will simply say this. Indigenous people deserve so much better than the treatment they’ve received since the early days of colonization. True reconciliation cannot occur without land reparations.

To quote IWGIA, “Loss of land and natural resources undermine economic security, sociocultural cohesion and human dignity of indigenous peoples around the world. “
This is a pattern that is great for beginners, as it features only whole stitches. An excellent gift for the anti-colonialist or Indigenous person in your life! 

This pattern is inspired by floral patterns and colours often seen in beading! If stitched on Aida 14 (recommended), this project will fit nicely inside an 8x10 frame.


What your Purchase Includes:
- 1 PDF file that includes a color pattern with color and symbols, as well as black and white patterns in one and two page sizes.
- It also includes a legend of all thread types, and what types of stitches are required for completion.

If you complete this project, please feel free to share it with me! I would be very happy to share your work on Becksthread’s social media.
instagram.com/becksthread or #becksthread


As always – not to be reproduced for profit in any way! This project is copyrighted.


If you have any questions or want another scale or version of the pattern than what was provided, send me a message and I will happily oblige. 
And then, if you’re happy with the pattern, please rate my shop! It means so much to an Etsy shop to receive ratings! 

Thanks so much! Chi-miigwech!

results.title: Leather Necklace (purple) inspirational
results.description:
This leather necklace {universal sizing} comes in Purple and carries a charm as shown in pics unscripted with “Live Laugh Love ”. 

The clasp is a lobster claw clasp and there is also a 2inch extender chain for adjustment .  

As with all costume jewelry it is highly recommended you do not expose your leather necklace to moisture , doing so may alter the look of your jewelry as well as tarnish some parts .  

This necklace makes a wonderful gift for a friend or anyone you’d like to show love appreciation too .
